code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import iconCart from'../assets/images/iconCart.png';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{toggleStatusTab}from'../stores/cart';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const[totalQuantity,setTotalQuantity]=useState(0);const carts=useSelector(store=>store.cart.items);const dispatch=useDispatch();useEffect(()=>{let total=0;carts.forEach(item=>total+=item.quantity);setTotalQuantity(total);},[carts]);const handleOpenTabCart=()=>{dispatch(toggleStatusTab());};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"flex justify-between items-center mb-5 bg-rose-100 h-16",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"text-xl font-semibold",children:"Home."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"w-10 h-10 bg-gray-100 rounded-full\r flex justify-center items-center relative",onClick:handleOpenTabCart,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:iconCart,alt:"iconCart",className:"w-6"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"absolute top-2/3 right-1/2  bg-red-500 text-white text-sm w-5 h-5\r rounded-full flex justify-center items-center",children:totalQuantity})]})]});};export default Header;
